title: Concrete plans to recycle Danish turbines
lead: Scheme will recycle turbine blades for use in cement industry. Danes want to be seen as world’s best in reusing wind tech

title: Biden signs executive order to replace entire government fleet with EVs
lead: The new electrification plan could affect over 645,000 vehicles

title: Could magnets in MRI scanners unlock the key to generating more wind energy?
lead: A team of GE engineers has been awarded additional funding to apply decades of healthcare experience to develop a more powerful superconducting generator for offshore wind turbines

title: Scientists warn not all tree planting is good!
lead: Several tree-planting initiatives do not increase carbon capture and could lead to negative impacts on biodiversity, landscapes and livelihoods, according to new research

title: Spain’s Iberdrola secures €100m from EU bank for greener innovation strategy
lead: It will support the development of sustainable technologies aligned with the energy transition, decarbonisation and electrification of the economy

title: Businesses in Ireland offered €14m for energy efficiency
lead: Applicants must embed energy efficiency in the design of their projects, focusing on energy uses such as heating, cooling, refrigeration, compressed air and business processes

title: Anglo-French interconnector comes online as low carbon electricity starts flowing
lead: The project through a 149-mile subsea power cable can provide enough energy to power one million homes

title: Chile gold mine gets some sunshine with solar power
lead: The project is forecast to save approximately 104,000 tonnes of carbon dioxide over a ten-year period

title: Renewables ‘overtook fossil fuels as the EU main electricity source for first time in 2020’
lead: Wind and solar generated a fifth of Europe’s electricity last year, a new report finds

title: Australian government to build ‘futuristic’ net zero homes with Tesla batteries
lead: Homeowners could see their power bills slashed by AUD$1,600 every year
